text: Marko Brekalo (born 24 November 1992) is a Croatian professional footballer who plays as a forward for NK Hrvatski Dragovoljac. In his career Brekalo played mainly in Croatia for teams such as: Lokomotiva, Dubrava, HNK Gorica, Cibalia or Šibenik, among others, but he also played in Austria and Slovenia for Floridsdorfer AC and Krka. ==References== ==External links== * * * Marko Brekalo at lpf.ro Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Zagreb Category:Croatian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:NK Hrvatski Dragovoljac players Category:Croatian First Football League players Category:NK Lokomotiva players Category:HNK Cibalia players Category:Croatian Second Football League players Category:HNK Gorica players Category:NK Zelina players Category:NK Lučko players Category:HNK Šibenik players Category:Austrian Football Second League players Category:Floridsdorfer AC players Category:NK Krka players Category:Liga I players Category:FC Botoșani players Category:Croatian expatriate footballers Category:Croatian expatriate sportspeople in Austria Category:Expatriate footballers in Austria Category:Croatian expatriate sportspeople in Slovenia Category:Expatriate footballers in Slovenia Category:Croatian expatriate sportspeople in Romania Category:Expatriate footballers in Romania
title: Marko Brekalo
